name: Interface
description:
Interface is a Sci-Fi, 2-D Platformer set in a dystopian future where humanity is on the brink of extinction. 

You play as one of the last humans, outfitted with a device that lets you hack into machines on a molecular level allowing you to possess them. This advanced technique is called "ghosting".

You must make your way through the factory and find your way to the source to disable it.

(This game was developed as part of a group at London South Bank University for the Games Design and Development course.)
